website_summaries.verdict: A steel platform truck that is intended for use during non-industrial and industrial applications alike.
pros: Steel deck is expertly welded for maximum strength and durability
Features a steel handle that can be removed for easy storage
Includes a floor lock to help keep your items in place while you are using the platform truck
Equipped with four rubber casters that provide exceptional maneuverability
cons: Can be difficult to lock the platform truck's handle into place

customer_reviews.title: Made in China (without) pride
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with 1 bad caster that leaked the ball bearings all over the place because it wasnt pressed properly. Called Vestil directly and got a replacement mailed out. cool - except the replacement was a different style, looks like they must have worked out the problem with a different manufacturing process. New caster was 3/4" shorter than the others so i had to level it with stacked washers. Now the front caster bearing is failing. China at its finest
customer_reviews.author: jcrevs

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Platform Unlike Most Politicians
customer_reviews.text: The Vestil ECSPT-2448 Steel Platform Truck with 6" x 2" Rubber Caster & 2000 lbs Capacity arrived with a good fit and finish. Assembly was straight forward and the removable cotter pin on the handle was a nice touch allowing for easy install and removal of the handle when required. Like so many others stated the packaging was almost non-existent when it arrived. How all the parts got here is beyond me but they did and remarkably with no damage. Had it suffered damage like another reviewer said "It's a Platform Truck it's going to look like that after a few days of use anyway".
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Millworks, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty.. but ooof, the STENCH
customer_reviews.text: As everyone noted, the box comes completely obliterated. Literally slipped right off. Heavy duty cart and the typical you-install-the-wheels setup. Easy enough. Yes the handlebar slips out but I’ve seen that on the $500+ Rubbermaid carts too. But my god, the chemical smell coming off this thing, what the heck! Scary. Unnecessary. Unclear what or why. Kept it out on the porch to air it out but the smell remains. Nothing leaking or anything... just beware. I’m honestly scared of what this thing is made of or where it’s been for it to smell like this.
customer_reviews.author: mnelshen

customer_reviews.title: Product was damaged - Need a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Hello, When product was received box was torn apart and flat bed where handle goes into was bent. I am not able to get the handle into the hole. Please advise on how we can have a new flat bed sent to us. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Alison B.

customer_reviews.title: Zero star
customer_reviews.text: arrived late, without wheels, scratches, and cracking from all the sides I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Issa

customer_reviews.title: Decent for such a low cost, the handle could be an issue
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed that the handle just sits in the openings with no way to secure it, if you lift up at all it's coming right out. We've drilled and transplanted a pin from another old cart to fix it, but not real smart to leave that off. The packaging is very thin cardboard that does not hold up well, luckily the unit arrived with all parts intact. Overall is fine for our use.
customer_reviews.author: WD

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts-Crazy
customer_reviews.text: It came incomplete. The platform cart did not come with wheels. I am having a very hard time getting any response. I bought two platform carts- one new and one used-neither one came with wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Duncan

customer_reviews.title: DOLLY FOR CONCRETE AND SAND
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning out the workshop and I got this to put my concrete and sand on so I could move it around if I wanted to clean under it. This is going to be very handy. I did think it was a little over priced but it is the only one I found for the size I wanted. Easy assembly. Handle comes off so I can stow it under a table.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Good cart but handle not affixed.
customer_reviews.text: Good cart. Wish the handle bar would lock or latch in some way to the flat cart. It just sits in two holders and is held there by gravity. I drilled holes, tapped and bolted the handle bar ends in place.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Handle comes out easily. Wish it would lock in place
customer_reviews.text: Handle comes out easily. Wish it would lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: cdm

customer_reviews.title: Damage
customer_reviews.text: Hello, Box came damage. The product came scratched and damaged. Brand new. Box looks like it was beat up ans smacked around.
customer_reviews.author: Cheetahs

customer_reviews.title: Shipping disaster
customer_reviews.text: The item might as well been shipped with out a box. The entire item was scratched ( handle , base, handle and base connector). To utilize the handle bar I will need to hammer the base connect closer to the shape it needs to be to accept the handle bar. I would return the unit, but I would need to go purchase a box big enough to fit it, so I will make due with a damaged product that need to be remolded to be put to it intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Castro

customer_reviews.title: Missing Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt of this order, "Vestil ECSPT-2448 Steel Platform Truck, 6"x 2" Rubber Caster" 2000 lbs Capacity, 48" Length x 24" Width x 11.8" Height Deck", I realized when unpacked that not all hardware was present. Missing was five (5) bolts, and the associated hardware. I would appreciate a follow-up in the replacement of that hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus L. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Wheel
customer_reviews.text: So when I got the box it had a hole in one corner, which was fine until after opening I realised that one of the wheels must have gotten out the hole and I only had 3.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Outerbridge

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I can carry one cord and charge different electronics.

customer_reviews.title: Great cart for the price but it was missing parts
customer_reviews.text: great cart for what I need to put my camp. The box it came in was all beat up and it's got a couple dents in it and was missing bolts. I sent my son down to Lowes and he got the missing bolts that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: JAYFAV

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: This cart pretty well made and comes with heavy casters with grease fittings. The packaging is inadequate to prevent shipping scuffs and scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to steer. Knocked off a star because one wheel is shorter then the other 3 which causes a wobble when empty.

customer_reviews.title: As expected and very well made for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Performs as expected. Packaging was trashed and contents were spilling out when it arrived.

customer_reviews.title: Good product

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and ordered. Easy to assemble and is perfect! I use it to transport colorguard floor tarp and props and it’s made our show time much easier.

customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS CART. IT IS PERFECT FOR OUR USE AND WE WOULD LIKE TO ORDER MORE IF IT WAS AVAILABLE.

product_meta.title: Vestil ECSPT-2448 Steel Platform Truck, 6" x 2" Rubber Caster, 2000 lbs Capacity, 48" Length x 24" Width x 11.8" Height Deck
product_meta.description: Vestil platform truck with 6-inches diameter by 2-inches width rubber caster. Solid, smooth steel deck is all welded and features structural reinforcement underneath for extra strength. Includes one removable high-polished steel handle and rolls smoothly on two rigid and two swivel casters. 2000-pounds capacity. Measures 48-inches length by 24-inches width by 11.8-inches height.
feature_bullets: Platform Truck with solid, smooth steel deck is all welded for maximum strength
Features structural reinforcement underneath for extra strength
Includes one (1) removable high-polished steel handle for easy storage
Comes with a floor lock on four (4) rubber casters for smooth manuverability
